text: Arrā ni tsuite, kyogi o tsukuriageru ijō ni, fugi o okonau mono ga arou ka. Mata nani mo keiji o ukenainoni `watashi ni, keiji ga kudatta.' To iu mono. Aruiwa `watashi wa arrā ga kudasa reta no to, nitamono o kudaseru.' To iu mono (ijō ni fugimono ga arou ka). Korera no fugi no to ga, makki no tsūku no naka de, tenshi-tachi ga te o sashidashite,`anata gata no tamashī o watase. Anata gata wa arrā ni tsuite, shinjitsude wanai koto o ittari sono shirushi ni taishite 倣慢Na taido o totte ki tari shita koto ni, hazubeki chōbatsu o no ku noda.' To iu toki no sugata o anata (muhanmado) ni misete yaritai monodearu
